hints.content: He is the youngest of the Seven Dwarfs.
He does not speak.
He wears a purple hat and green tunic.
His clothes are too big for him.
He is often the butt of Doc's jokes.
He dances with Snow White on his shoulders.
He finds diamonds in the mine.
He has big ears.
He tries to get a second kiss from Snow White.
He plays the drums during the party.
He swallows a bar of soap.
He is bald.
He wiggles his ears.
He is the only dwarf without a beard.
He is very clumsy but lovable.
He sleeps in a drawer.
He puts diamonds in his eyes.
He is the last one to leave the mine.
He is scared of the Queen disguised as a hag.
He is a pantomime character.
He is a baby elephant.
He has enormous ears.
He can fly.
His real name is Jumbo Jr.
His mother is Mrs. Jumbo.
He is teased by other elephants.
His best friend is Timothy Q. Mouse.
He holds a magic feather.
He becomes a circus star.
He doesn't speak.
He gets drunk on champagne.
He sees pink elephants on parade.
He wakes up in a tree.
He is made into a clown.
He visits his mother in solitary confinement.
He is delivered by a stork.
He has blue eyes.
He sprays the ringmaster with peanuts.
He is the only title character who doesn't speak.
He wears a yellow hat.
He is a gloomy donkey.
His tail is attached with a nail.
He lives in the Hundred Acre Wood.
He often loses his tail.
He eats thistles.
He lives in a stick house that falls down.
He says 'Thanks for noticin' me'.
He is friends with Pooh and Piglet.
He is voiced by Peter Cullen (Optimus Prime).
He receives a burst red balloon as a gift.
He receives an empty honey pot as a gift.
He is generally pessimistic.
He has a pink bow on his tail sometimes.
He floats in the river.
He is stuffed with sawdust.
He says 'Oh, bother' rarely, usually Pooh says it.
He is grey in color.
He thinks Tigger is bouncy.
He finds a new tail which is actually Owl's bell pull.
He is slow-moving.
She is the Crown Princess of Avalor.
She was trapped in an amulet for 41 years.
She plays the guitar.
She has a scepter of light.
She has a sister named Isabel.
She rides a jaquin named Skylar.
She defeated Shuriki.
She wears a red dress.
She is the first Latina Disney Princess.
She has a Grand Council.
She has magic powers.
She is voiced by Aimee Carrero.
She has a spirit guide named Zuzo.
She becomes Queen at the end of her series.
She celebrates Dia de los Muertos.
She has a wizard friend named Mateo.
She is brave and compassionate.
She wears a flower in her hair.
She was saved by Sofia the First.
She rules over a kingdom inspired by Latin culture.
She is the Snow Queen.
She has ice powers.
She sings 'Let It Go'.
She accidentally freezes her kingdom.
She has a sister named Anna.
She creates a snow monster named Marshmallow.
She builds an ice castle.
She wears a blue ice dress.
She hears a mysterious voice calling her.
She is the fifth spirit.
She rides a water horse named the Nokk.
She is voiced by Idina Menzel.
She has platinum blonde hair.
She isolates herself to protect others.
She catches a cold and makes snowgies.
She abdicates the throne to her sister.
The cold never bothered her anyway.
She was born with her powers.
She wears gloves to conceal her magic.
She travels to Ahtohallan.
She is the daughter of the Evil Queen.
She has blue hair.
She is a fashion designer.
She is best friends with Mal.
She has a magic mirror.
She is a character in Descendants.
She dates Doug, Dopey's son.
She is played by Sofia Carson.
She lives on the Isle of the Lost.
She is obsessed with beauty initially.
She makes the cotillion dresses.
She is very smart.
She sings 'Rotten to the Core'.
She wears a heart necklace.
She helps Ben with his kingly duties.
She wants a castle of her own.
She uses chemistry to make makeup.
She is known for her blue leather jacket.
She learns that being fair is more important than being fairest.
She starts a fashion brand called Evie's 4 Hearts.
She asks 'Mirror, mirror on the wall'.
She wants to be the fairest of them all.
She is Snow White's stepmother.
She transforms into an old hag.
She poisons an apple.
She orders a huntsman to kill Snow White.
She wants Snow White's heart in a box.
She falls off a cliff.
She wears a crown and a high collar.
She has a pet raven.
Her name is Queen Grimhilde.
She is the first Disney villain.
She uses a spell book.
She is very vain.
She is jealous of her stepdaughter.
She creates a sleeping death potion.
She is cold and cruel.
She wears a purple robe.
She is crushed by a boulder (implied).
She has a dungeon laboratory.
They are Flora, Fauna, and Merryweather.
They raise Aurora in the forest.
They argue over the color of the dress (pink vs blue).
They give gifts to the baby princess.
They shrink down to small size.
They bake a lopsided cake.
They use magic wands.
They put the kingdom to sleep.
They release Prince Phillip.
They turn the arrows into flowers.
They enchant the sword of truth.
One wears red, one green, one blue.
They pretend to be peasant aunts.
They fight Maleficent's goons.
They are good fairies.
Merryweather is the feisty one.
Fauna is the gentle one.
Flora is the leader.
They appear in Kingdom Hearts.
They give the gift of beauty and song.
He is a small purple dragon.
He is the mascot of the Imagination pavilion.
He sings 'One Little Spark'.
He was created by Dreamfinder.
He has orange wings and horns.
He is from Epcot.
He wears a yellow sweater.
He is mischievous and playful.
He explores the senses.
He turns a house upside down.
He becomes a skunk.
He is a figment of your imagination.
He appears in Inside Out as an easter egg.
He has a popcorn bucket that people wait hours for.
He has large yellow eyes.
He represents creativity.
He annoys Dr. Nigel Channing.
He has a comic book series.
He is small in size.
He has two tiny claws on his hands.
He is a sloth.
He works at the DMV.
He moves very slowly.
He laughs in slow motion.
He is friends with Nick Wilde.
He drives a sports car very fast.
His full name is Flash Slothmore.
He appears in Zootopia.
He helps Judy Hopps run a license plate.
He wears a green shirt and tie.
He has a mug that says 'You want it when?'.
He tells a joke to his coworker Priscilla.
He is the 'fastest' sloth at the DMV.
He smiles very slowly.
He is pulled over for speeding.
He has three toes.
He frustrates Judy Hopps.
He is voiced by Raymond S. Persi.
He attends the Gazelle concert.
He takes a long time to stamp a paper.
